com.extensia.xcp.services.restapi.model.parameters.validators

Class NotBlankValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.extensia.xcp.services.restapi.model.parameters.validators.NotBlankValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageParameterValidator, ListParameterValidator, TextParameterValidator

    public class NotBlankValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageParameterValidator, TextParameterValidator, ListParameterValidator
    Validator implementation class that enforces that a text ir list parameter value is non-blank, and than an image byte array is not zero length.
